text: thanks a lot for your feedback. also, do you know if it would be possible to have different SMTP's set up?
I really don't know unfortunately. I know that I can send emails from both my gmail and HubSpot (using the same email address) but I think they're using the same SMTP
you can do it throught HubSpot or you can choose different platform like sendinblue
just put the api of sendinblue and select your preferred language integrate with it
Yes, you can do a completely different one but you can't have both I don't think

Also a quick tip to make sure emails are logged if you're using sendgrid or other you can bcc HubSpot emails <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/settings/log-email-in-your-crm-with-the-bcc-or-forwarding-address>
